segments.text: Whoa, I didn't expect to see water pouring from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's on, and it's overflowing big time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lady's right there, but she hasn't turned around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle's growing fast under her foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now look at the boy on that stoolâ€”it's tilting!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies from the jar up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up too, like they're in on a secret.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Mom's drying dishes, completely missing all this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is so normal through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is wild, hazards everywhere indoors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Can't believe they're not noticing the dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR
